Class JkJarPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.java.JkJarPacker

  • public final class JkJarPacker
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities class to produce Jar files.

      static JkPathMatcher EXCLUDE_SIGNATURE_MATCHER

      • makeFatJar

        public void makeFatJar(java.nio.file.Path resultFile,
                       java.lang.Iterable<java.nio.file.Path> otherJars)
        Creates a fat jar file according specified parameters. Fat jar file including the content of other jars. The result jar does not contains other jars as zip entry but content of the other jars is merged with the content of original jar.
        Parameters:
        resultFile - Result file
        otherJars - content of other jar to merge with the original jar
